1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu'awiyah bin Abu Sufyan that :He asked Umm Habibah, the wife of the Prophet: "What did you used to do with the Messenger of Allah when you were menstruating?" She said: "If it was at the beginning of the period when the bleeding is heavy, we would tie the waist-wrapper tightly around our thighs, then lie down with the Messenger of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لِلرَّجُلِ مِنِ امْرَأَتِهِ إِذَا كَانَتْ حَائِضًا
chapter.eng-name: What a man may do with his wife when she is menstruating
